title: AI Assistant
welcomeMessage: Hi! I can help you customize your skill map. Try asking me to add skills, suggest what to learn next, or merge with another map.
inputPlaceholder: Ask me to modify your skill map...
readOnlyPlaceholder: Sign in to chat and modify this map
errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
previewDescription: The following changes will be applied to your skill map:
mergeDescription: Combine two skill maps into one unified map
selectMapToMerge: Select a map to merge with your current map:
noOtherMaps: You don't have any other skill maps to merge with.
errorLoadingMaps: Failed to load your maps. Please try again.
errorMerging: Failed to merge maps. Please try again.
mergeWarning: This will replace your current map with the merged version. You can undo this change.
signInToApply: Sign in to apply these changes to your skill map.
